description: This file defines a React functional component named FilterPanel, which renders a filter panel UI with a search input, toggle button for collapsibility, and control buttons for applying or clearing filters. It manages internal state for UI behavior and communicates filter changes via a callback.

methods.name: FilterPanel({ initial = {}, onChange, collapsible = true, title = 'Filters' })
methods.description: React component that renders a filter panel with optional collapsing, search input, and control buttons.
